## Schema

- `protocol` (String) 'tcp': tcp; 'udp': udp; 'icmp': icmp; 'other': other;

### Optional

- `action` (String) 'permit': Whitelist incoming packets for protocol; 'deny': Blacklist incoming packets for protocol;
